name: Ether Cards Founder Series, Type: Alpha, ID:747
description: Ether Cards Founder Series First Edition Card

traits.name: Limited Trait Slot
traits.description: A Limited Trait Slot for one of the Fundamental Traits

traits.name: Limited Trait Slot
traits.description: A Limited Trait Slot for one of the Fundamental Traits

traits.name: Reforge
traits.description: One time ability to re-randomize any (or all) selected layers in the main accidental art image of the card

traits.name: 10% Discount
traits.description: One time discount, max 1 ETH value

traits.name: Free Ticket
traits.description: One time free ticket to any participating raffle

traits.name: Disco Dropper
traits.description: Drops a random common Discount to the card. Replaces it once a month. Can burn the Disco Dropper Trait to keep the Trait.

traits.name: Selective Layer Reroll
traits.description: This trait rerolls the selected layers on your card. (Maybe with a higher chance of rerolling into the artist of your unique artwork (if Alpha or OG)). The trait is burned when used.

traits.name: True Name
traits.description: Enables the holders of this trait to name their Ether.Cards/Accidental Collabs

title: Window
